## Description
Preparing your data for analysis can me time consuming and tedious. But, it is a necessary step before analyzing your data. This lesson dives deep into what is tidy and normalize data and how make sure your data structure follow a "tidy structure". It also introduces relational data models and provides an overview of merging data using joins. This lesson explores fundamentals concepts for working with data and includes a hands on exercise to apply these concepts to a real data set.
